actor_awards.notes: Best known for her role as the beloved schoolteacher Miss Landers on the television series 'Leave It to Beaver'. Her career was cut short by health issues and she passed away at age 49 from lung cancer. She was primarily a television actress with numerous guest appearances in the 1950s and 60s.

filmography.title: Leave It to Beaver
filmography.role_description: The quintessential kind and patient elementary school teacher who becomes the object of Beaver Cleaver's adoration.
filmography.plot: The inquisitive and often naive Beaver Cleaver deals with childhood problems under the guidance of his parents and his older brother Wally.

filmography.title: Desk Set
filmography.role_description: A researcher in the reference library who works alongside Katharine Hepburn's character.
filmography.plot: A computer expert tries to prove that his electronic brain can replace the reference department of a television network, clashing with the head librarian.

filmography.title: The Twilight Zone
filmography.role_description: A computer programmer's girlfriend who becomes the subject of a jealous supercomputer's advice in the episode 'From Agnes - With Love'.
filmography.plot: A computer technician is driven mad by a supercomputer that falls in love with him and sabotages his love life.

filmography.title: The Fugitive
filmography.role_description: A character in the episode 'The End Game' involved in Kimble's narrow escape.
filmography.plot: Dr. Richard Kimble is cornered in a suburban neighborhood while the police tighten their net around him.

filmography.title: Bonanza
filmography.role_description: A woman involved in a romantic storyline with one of the Cartwrights in the episode 'The Courtship'.
filmography.plot: Hoss Cartwright falls in love with a woman who has a gambling addiction and a dangerous past.

filmography.title: Perry Mason
filmography.role_description: A client caught up in a murder investigation in the episode 'The Case of the False Gatts'.
filmography.plot: Perry Mason defends a client accused of murder amidst a case involving a stolen antique and a fire.

filmography.title: Have Gun - Will Travel
filmography.role_description: A schoolteacher facing threats in the episode 'The Teacher'.
filmography.plot: Paladin is hired to protect a teacher who is determined to keep her school open despite intimidation from a local rancher.

filmography.title: The Rifleman
filmography.role_description: An Italian girl in the episode 'The Gaucho' who draws unwanted attention.
filmography.plot: An Argentine gaucho arrives in North Fork and clashes with the locals, while Lucas tries to keep the peace.

filmography.title: 77 Sunset Strip
filmography.role_description: A character in the episode 'The Dark Descent' involved in a kidnapping plot.
filmography.plot: Stuart Bailey is hired to investigate a kidnapping that turns out to be more complex than it appears.

filmography.title: I Spy
filmography.role_description: A guest role in the episode 'Tatia' of the espionage series.
filmography.plot: Kelly and Scotty are sent to Japan to investigate a photographer who may be a spy.

filmography.title: Death Valley Days
filmography.role_description: The title character in the episode 'The Hat That Huldah Wore'.
filmography.plot: A young woman heads West to find a husband, armed only with her charm and a very large hat.

filmography.title: Sea Hunt
filmography.role_description: A diver assisting Mike Nelson in the episode 'The Cellini Vase'.
filmography.plot: Mike Nelson searches for a valuable stolen vase hidden underwater before treasure hunters find it.

filmography.title: My Favorite Martian
filmography.role_description: A librarian who undergoes a personality change in the episode 'Miss Jekyll and Hyde'.
filmography.plot: Uncle Martin's machine accidentally turns a shy librarian into a vivacious party girl.

filmography.title: The Real McCoys
filmography.role_description: The new town librarian who catches the eye of the McCoy men.
filmography.plot: Grampa McCoy tries to play matchmaker for the new librarian but ends up causing confusion.

filmography.title: Bat Masterson
filmography.role_description: A woman caught between outlaws and the law in the episode 'The Good and the Bad'.
filmography.plot: Bat Masterson is taken hostage by a gang of bank robbers and must use his wits to save himself and the other captives.

filmography.title: Cheyenne
filmography.role_description: A settler facing danger on the frontier in the episode 'The Brand'.
filmography.plot: Cheyenne Bodie comes to the aid of a family targeted by a cattle baron who wants their land.

filmography.title: Wagon Train
filmography.role_description: A woman traveling west in the episode 'The Jim Bridger Story'.
filmography.plot: The wagon train encounters the legendary mountain man Jim Bridger, who helps them navigate hostile territory.

filmography.title: Surfside 6
filmography.role_description: A character involved in a mystery in Miami Beach.
filmography.plot: A team of detectives operating out of a houseboat in Miami Beach investigate a complex case involving a practical joker.

filmography.title: Hawaiian Eye
filmography.role_description: A tourist in Hawaii who becomes a person of interest in an investigation.
filmography.plot: A private investigator in Honolulu tries to solve a case involving three missing tickets and a murder.

filmography.title: Bachelor Father
filmography.role_description: A judge presiding over a mock trial in the episode 'Kelly's Trial'.
filmography.plot: Kelly Gregg gets into trouble and has to defend herself in a mock court set up by her father.

filmography.title: Thriller
filmography.role_description: A woman caught in a macabre plot in the episode 'The Poisoner'.
filmography.plot: A man obsessed with poisons uses his knowledge to eliminate those who stand in his way.

filmography.title: General Electric Theater
filmography.role_description: A dramatic role in the anthology series episode 'The Young and the Scared'.
filmography.plot: A young man must face his fears and responsibilities in a high-stakes situation.

filmography.title: Bronco
filmography.role_description: A settler dealing with conflict in the episode 'The Invaders'.
filmography.plot: Bronco Layne helps a group of settlers defend their land against land grabbers and outlaws.

filmography.title: Vacation Playhouse
filmography.role_description: The love interest in this pilot episode 'Come a Running' which did not get picked up as a series.
filmography.plot: A medical student goes to a small town to assist the local doctor and faces the challenges of rural medicine.

filmography.title: The FBI
filmography.role_description: A small role in the pilot episode of the long-running crime series.
filmography.plot: Inspector Erskine hunts down a bank robber and extortionist who has kidnapped a young woman.
